title: Drawing, "Designs for Commodes", ca. 1805
medium: Graphite, pen and ink, brush and watercolor on paper
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Elevations of two chests. Upper left, a design for a chest with doors; lower left, detail of construction, section through top. At upper right, a design for a chest with three drawers; lower right, detail of construction, section through top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Designs for Commodes", ca. 1805.
ca. 1805. Graphite, pen and ink, brush and watercolor on paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-497.
